statements: SELECT * FROM traffic_violations;
SELECT violation_type, violation_date, fine_amount FROM traffic_violations;
SELECT * FROM traffic_violations WHERE location = 'Main Street';
SELECT violation_type, violation_date, fine_amount FROM traffic_violations ORDER BY violation_date DESC;
SELECT violation_type, fine_amount FROM traffic_violations WHERE fine_amount > 1000 ORDER BY fine_amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM traffic_violations WHERE violation_type = 'Speeding' ORDER BY violation_date DESC;
SELECT violation_type, SUM(fine_amount) AS total_fines FROM traffic_violations GROUP BY violation_type;
SELECT * FROM traffic_violations WHERE violation_type IN ('Speeding', 'Parking') AND fine_amount > 100 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT AVG(fine_amount) AS average_fine_amount, COUNT(*) AS total_violations FROM traffic_violations;
SELECT violation_type, COUNT(*) AS total_violations FROM traffic_violations WHERE violation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' GROUP BY violation_type ORDER BY total_violations DESC;
SELECT violation_id, driver_license, violation_type, violation_date FROM traffic_violations;
SELECT vehicle_plate_number, violation_date, violation_type FROM parking_violations;
SELECT violation_date, violation_type, violation_id, driver_license FROM traffic_violations;
SELECT violation_type, fine_amount, violation_id, vehicle_plate_number FROM parking_violations;
SELECT violation_id, driver_license, violation_type FROM traffic_violations WHERE violation_date = '2022-01-05';
SELECT * FROM traffic_violations WHERE violation_type = 'Speeding' ORDER BY violation_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT violation_id, driver_license FROM traffic_violations WHERE violation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT vehicle_plate_number, violation_type, violation_date FROM parking_violations WHERE fine_amount > 100 ORDER BY violation_date ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_violations FROM traffic_violations UNION SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_violations FROM parking_violations;
SELECT violation_id, violation_type, fine_amount FROM parking_violations WHERE violation_type IN ('Illegal Parking', 'Expired Meter') ORDER BY fine_amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM speeding_tickets;
SELECT vehicle_number, location, speed FROM speeding_tickets WHERE speed > 60;
SELECT location, fine_amount FROM parking_violations ORDER BY fine_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM traffic_cameras WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT * FROM parking_violations WHERE violation_type = 'Illegal Parking' ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT * FROM speeding_tickets WHERE speed > 100 ORDER BY fine_amount DESC;
SELECT location, vehicle_number FROM parking_violations WHERE violation_type = 'Expired Meter' LIMIT 10;
SELECT location, camera_type FROM traffic_cameras ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT fine_amount, vehicle_number FROM speeding_tickets WHERE location LIKE '%Highway%' AND fine_amount > 100 ORDER BY vehicle_number ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT speeding_tickets.id, speeding_tickets.vehicle_number, parking_violations.location, traffic_cameras.camera_type FROM speeding_tickets LEFT JOIN parking_violations ON speeding_tickets.vehicle_number = parking_violations.vehicle_number JOIN traffic_cameras ON parking_violations.location = traffic_cameras.location WHERE speeding_tickets.speed > 120 AND parking_violations.violation_type = 'Illegal Parking' ORDER BY speeding_tickets.id DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM speeding_tickets;
SELECT ticket_id, violation_date, fine_amount FROM parking_tickets;
SELECT owner_name, license_plate FROM vehicles WHERE owner_address = '123 Main St';
SELECT violation_location, violation_date FROM speeding_tickets ORDER BY violation_date DESC;
SELECT officer_name, badge_number FROM officers WHERE officer_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM speeding_tickets WHERE fine_amount > 100 ORDER BY violation_date DESC;
SELECT ticket_id, violation_location FROM parking_tickets WHERE violation_location LIKE 'Downtown%' ORDER BY violation_date ASC;
SELECT violation_location, fine_amount FROM speeding_tickets WHERE violation_location = 'Highway 101' ORDER BY fine_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM vehicles JOIN speeding_tickets ON vehicles.vehicle_id = speeding_tickets.vehicle_id WHERE owner_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT officer_name, badge_number FROM officers WHERE officer_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM SpeedingTickets;
SELECT ticket_id, driver_name FROM SpeedingTickets WHERE violation_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT violation_id, vehicle_plate, violation_date FROM ParkingViolations WHERE fine_amount > 100;
SELECT driver_name, license_number FROM Drivers ORDER BY driver_name ASC;
SELECT vehicle_make, vehicle_model FROM Vehicles WHERE vehicle_plate LIKE 'ABC%';
SELECT * FROM SpeedingTickets WHERE violation_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT driver_name, fine_amount FROM SpeedingTickets WHERE fine_amount > 1000 ORDER BY fine_amount DESC;
SELECT Drivers.driver_name, Vehicles.vehicle_make, Vehicles.vehicle_model FROM Drivers INNER JOIN Vehicles ON Drivers.driver_id = Vehicles.vehicle_id;
SELECT violation_type, description FROM ViolationTypes WHERE type_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT vehicle_plate, COUNT(*) AS total_tickets FROM SpeedingTickets GROUP BY vehicle_plate HAVING COUNT(*) > 5 ORDER BY total_tickets DESC;
